test_case.system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that excels at logical reasoning.
test_case.user_prompt: You have two ropes, and each takes exactly 60 minutes to burn from one end to the other. They do not burn at a uniform rate. How can you measure exactly 45 minutes?

evaluation.expected_answer: Light Rope A from both ends and Rope B from one end simultaneously. When Rope A finishes burning in 30 minutes, light the other end of Rope B. Rope B will finish burning in another 15 minutes, for a total of 45 minutes.
